title: Guides
overview: AUCS team has chosen the following four guides to demonstrate the power of community contributors.

groups.title: Aurelia CLI guide
groups.overview: Aurelia CLI is a desktop tool using the command line interface to generate an Aurelia skeleton application.
groups.author: aucs-publishers

groups.title: Aurelia Full-Stack guide
groups.overview: This guide is covering many different scenarios where Aurelia application acts as a front end of a full stack application.
groups.author: aucs-publishers

groups.title: Identity Management Guide
groups.overview: Identity management (IdM) is the task of controlling information about users on computers: information that authenticates the identity of a user, and information that describes information and actions they are authorized to access and/or perform.
groups.author: aucs-publishers

groups.title: Tips and Tricks
groups.overview: Tips and Tricks is a collection of advices written to help you be more  productive with Aurelia framework.
groups.author: aucs-publishers
